funFacts.title: Aramaic's Hollywood Connection
funFacts.description: Did you know some lines in the movie 'The Passion of the Christ' are in Aramaic? This sparked a renewed interest in learning the ancient language, and fans were eager to understand these authentic biblical phrases.
